price: u njemu će vječno i zauvijek boraviti, ni zaštitnika ni pomagača neće naći.
arabic: خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَآ أَبَدٗاۖ لَّا يَجِدُونَ وَلِيّٗا وَلَا نَصِيرٗا

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: khālidīna fīhā abadan lā yajidūna waliyyan walā naṣīran
